keywords: Julia and Jacques Cooking at Home
name: Essentials: Vinaigrette
description: Between my junior and senior years of high school, I spent a summer studying in Paris. Although I knew enough to make a trip to Berthillon, discovered Nutella, and would hang around Fauchon staring at the piles of shining produce...
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup red or white wine vinegar
1 cup extra-virgin olive oil or peanut oil, or a mixture of the two

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients in a 12-ounce screwtop jar. Screw on the lid and shake very well. Taste and adjust seasonings, adding more oil or vinegar if necessary.
Refrigerate for up to 2 weeks, shaking before each use.
